summary.span: 创建在页面上显示图像的控件。

span.span: Creates a control that displays an image on a page.

summary.span: 单击在 控件内定义的作用点区域时，该控件生成到服务器的回发或导航到指定的 URL。

span.span: When a hot spot region defined within the control is clicked, the control either generates a postback to the server or navigates to a specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来创建包含已定义的作用点区域的映像。Use the control to create an image that contains defined hot spot regions. 当用户单击作用点区域时, 控件可以生成到服务器的回发或导航到指定的 URL。When a user clicks a hot spot region, the control can either generate a postback to the server or navigate to a specified URL. 例如, 您可以使用此控件显示地理区域的地图。For example, you can use this control to display a map of a geographical region. 当用户单击地图上的特定区域时, 控件将导航到提供有关所选区域的其他数据的 URL。When a user clicks a specific region on the map, the control navigates to a URL that provides additional data about the selected region. 你还可以使用此控件生成到服务器的回发, 并基于单击的作用点区域运行特定代码。You can also use this control to generate a postback to the server and run specific code based on the hot spot region that was clicked. 例如, 你可以使用控件来捕获用户响应, 如投票。For example, you can use an control to capture user responses such as votes. 当用户单击定义为 "是投票" 的作用点区域时, 将调用代码以在数据库中记录 "是" 响应。When a user clicks the hot spot region defined for yes votes, code is called to record a yes response in a database. 当用户单击定义为 "无投票" 的作用点区域时, 不会记录任何响应。When a user clicks on the hot spot region defined for no votes, a no response is recorded. 你还可以在单个控件中混合使用这两种方案。You can also mix these two scenarios within a single control. 例如, 你可以指定一个作用点区域以导航到 URL, 并指定另一个作用点区域回发到服务器。For example, you can specify one hot spot region to navigate to a URL and another hot spot region to post back to the server. 使用属性指定要为控件显示的图像的路径。 Use the property to specify the path to the image to display for the control. 可以在控件中定义任意数量的对象。You can define any number of objects within an control. 可以使用、 和类定义作用点区域。You can use the , , and classes to define hot spot regions. 或者, 你可以从抽象类派生, 以定义你自己的自定义热点对象。Alternatively, you can derive from the abstract class to define your own custom hot spot object. 单击时 ,可以通过两种方式指定控件在控件中的行为。There are two ways to specify the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked. 您可以使用控件上的属性或单个对象的属性。You can use either the property on the control or the property on an individual object. 这些属性是使用枚举值之一设置的。These properties are set using one of the enumeration values. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则每个对象上指定的属性将优先于控件上的属性。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 若要导航到 URL, 请将属性或属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。To navigate to a URL, set either the property or the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 使用属性指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要生成到服务器的回发, 请将属性或属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To generate a postback to the server, set either the property or the property to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 使用属性指定作用点区域的名称。Use the property to specify a name for the hot spot region. 发生回发事件时, 将在事件数据中传递此名称。This name will be passed in the event data when a postback event occurs. 当单击回发时 , 将引发事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 若要以编程方式控制在单击回发时执行的操作, 请为事件提供事件处理程序。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 若要使 控件中的所有对象都具有相同的行为, 请使用属性来指定行为。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, use the property to specify the behavior. 然后, 将每个单独对象的属性设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet` , 或者不指定属性的值。Then, either set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要为中的对象指定不同的行为, 请将每个单独对象的`HotSpotMode.Navigate`属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`设置为或。To specify different behaviors for objects in an , set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate` or `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. > [!NOTE] > `HotSpotMode.Navigate` 如果控件的属性或它所包含的任何对象的属性设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet` , 或者未设置为值, 则默认情况下该行为是。 If an control's property or the property on any of the objects it contains is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or is not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                        ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`, 这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个圆形作用点区域时导航到指定的 URL。 The property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, which causes the page to navigate to the specified URL each time a user clicks one of the circle hot spot regions. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/CS/imagemapclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/VB/imagemapclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`, 这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个作用点区域时回发到服务器。 The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个控件, 该控件包含具有不同行为的作用点。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains hot spots with different behaviors. 背景区域定义为回发到服务器的单个。The background area is a defined as a single that posts back to the server. 在同一区域中定义了三个对象。Three objects are defined in the same region. 其中每个作用点看起来像一个按钮, 并导航到 URL。Each of these hot spots looks like a button and navigates to a URL. 当在两个热点重叠的区域中单击控件时,首先声明的作用点优先。When an control is clicked in a region where two hot spots overlap, the hot spot that is declared first has precedence. 在此示例中, 将首先声明按钮热点, 并最后声明包含它们的背景作用点。In this example, the button hot spots are declared first and the background hot spot that contains them is declared last. 因此, 当用户单击按钮作用点时, 用户将获取按钮对象的行为, 而不是背景对象的行为。Therefore, the user gets the behavior of the button object, not the background object, when the user clicks a button hot spot. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass3/CS/imagemapclass3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass3/VB/imagemapclass3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 单击 控件的 对象时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a object in an control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件中的对象时,将引发事件。The event is raised when a object in an control is clicked. 若要允许 引发事件, 必须首先将控件 `HotSpotMode.Postback`上的属性或对象的属性设置为。To allow a to raise the event, you must first set either the property on the control or the property on the object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 若要以编程方式控制在单击回发时执行的操作, 请为包含事件时要运行的代码的事件提供事件处理程序。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event that contains the code to run when the event is raised. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`, 这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个作用点区域时回发到服务器。 The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 事件处理程序处理控件的 click 事件。 `VoteMap_Clicked`The `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler handles the click event for the control. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode
Public Overridable Property HotSpotMode As HotSpotMode

member this.HotSpotMode : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 对象时 控件的 对象的默认行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the default behavior for the objects of an control when the objects are clicked.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定控件内的对象的默认单击行为。 Use the property to specify the default click behavior of the objects within an control. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Inactive`|对象没有任何行为。The object does not have any behavior.| |`NotSet`|对象使用由控件的属性设置的行为。 The object uses the behavior set by the control's property. 如果控件未定义行为, 则对象将导航到 URL。 If the control does not define the behavior, the objects all navigate to a URL.| |`Navigate`|对象导航到 URL。The objects navigate to a URL.| |`PostBack`|对象生成到服务器的回发。The objects generate a postback to the server.| 您可以使用控件的属性或每个单独的对象的属性来指定对象的行为。You can specify a object's behavior using either the property of the control or the property of each individual object. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则每个对象上指定的属性将优先于控件上的属性。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 在设置 控件的`HotSpotMode.Navigate`属性时, 请注意,和值具有相同的行为:导航到URL。`HotSpotMode.NotSet`When you set the property of the control, note that the `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and `HotSpotMode.Navigate` values have the same behavior: both navigate to a URL. 为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`单个 对象的属性指定时, 将从控件的属性的值确定其行为。 When you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the property of an individual object, that determines its behavior from the value of the property of the control. 如果`HotSpotMode.Navigate` 为属性指定, 则在单击时页将导航到 URL。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the property, the page navigates to a URL when the is clicked. 使用属性指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 如果`HotSpotMode.PostBack` 为属性指定, 则在单击时, 该页会生成到服务器的回发。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the property, the page generates a postback to the server when the is clicked. 使用属性指定作用点区域的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the hot spot region. 发生回发事件时, 将在事件数据中传递此名称。This name will be passed in the event data when a postback event occurs. 当单击回发时 , 将引发事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 若要以编程方式控制在单击回发时执行的操作, 请为事件提供事件处理程序。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 如果`HotSpotMode.Inactive` 为属性指定, 则在单击对象时, 该对象不会有任何行为。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the property, the object does not have any behavior when it is clicked. 您可以使用此值在较大的活动作用点内创建非活动热点。You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot. 提供此选项是为了使你能够在控件中创建更复杂的作用点区域。This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an control. 若要在活动作用点内创建非活动区域, 必须在控件中的活动作用点之前指定非活动作用点。To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the control. 例如, 以下内容通过在较大的活动循环作用点中指定非活动的循环作用点来定义活动环:For example, the following defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` ``` 若要使 控件中的所有对象都具有相同的行为, 请 使用控件上的属性来指定行为。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, use the property on the control to specify the behavior. 然后, 将每个单独对象的属性设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet` , 或者不指定属性的值。Then, either set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要为控件中的对象指定不同的行为, 请将每个单独对象的`HotSpotMode.Navigate`属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`设置为`HotSpotMode.Inactive`、或。To specify different behaviors for objects in an control, set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. > [!NOTE] > `HotSpotMode.Navigate` 如果控件的属性或它所包含的任何对象的属性均设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或未设置为值, 则默认情况下该行为是。 If an control's property or the property on any of the objects it contains is either set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`, 这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个作用点区域时回发到服务器。 The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 不会在每个对象上设置 属性,因为它们从属性获取其行为。The property is not set on each of the objects because they get their behavior from the property. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMap.HotSpotMode1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.HotSpotMode1/CS/imagemap.hotspotmode1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMap.HotSpotMode1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.HotSpotMode1/VB/imagemap.hotspotmode1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection HotSpots { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property HotSpots As HotSpotCollection

member this.HotSpots : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中定义的作用点区域。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represents the defined hot spot regions in an control.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 控件中定义的作用点区域。

span.span: A object that represents the defined hot spot regions in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式管理控件中的作用点区域。 Use the property to programmatically manage the hot spot regions in an control. 您可以使用属性来添加、插入、删除和检索对象。You can use the property to add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建控件并向其中添加两个对象。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create an control and add two objects to it. 属性用于访问控件的 , 并向其中添加对象。 The property is used to access the for the control and add the objects to it. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMap.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.Cstr/CS/imagemap.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMap.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.Cstr/VB/imagemap.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从 方法保存的上一个页请求还原 控件的视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: is not a valid .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As ImageMapEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageMapEventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnClick : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs -> unit override this.OnClick : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 类型的参数。

span.span: An argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件中的对象时,将引发事件。The event is raised when a object in an control is clicked. 若要允许 引发事件, 必须首先将控件 `HotSpotMode.Postback`上的属性或对象的属性设置为。To allow a to raise the event, you must first set either the property on the control or the property on the object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: ImageMap Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Raises events for the control when a form is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该页将`eventArgument`参数值传递给控件的方法。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method of the control. 为已单击的对象引发事件。The raises a event for the object that was clicked.

para.span: 若要处理派生类中的 click 事件, 请重写方法。

span.span: To handle a click event in a derived class, override the method.

span.span: Sends the control content to the specified object, which writes the content to render on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 开发从控件派生的自定义服务器控件时, 可以重写此方法以生成的内容。When developing a custom server control derived from the control, you can override this method to generate content for the .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: override System::Object ^ SaveViewState();
override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的任何 控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to an control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回 控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的属性中, 该属性是类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后, 将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时, 此字符串对象将作为存储在`Hidden` HTML 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element. 创作自定义服务器控件时, 可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的`ViewState`属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

related.span: ImageMap Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 当窗体回发到服务器时, 应使用方法引发控件的事件。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event for the control when a form is posted back to the server. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要为对象定义引发事件的自定义实现, 请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 当控件的已发布数据发生更改时, 显式接口实现会调用方法来引发事件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame that displays the Web page content linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时，显示指定网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame that displays the specified Web page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 值必须以 A 到 Z 的字母（不区分大小写）开头，但下列以下划线开头的特殊值除外：

span.span: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore:

description.span: 将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。

span.span: Renders the content in a new window without frames.

description.span: 将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。

span.span: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.

description.span: 在搜索窗格中呈现内容。

span.span: Renders the content in the search pane.

description.span: 将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。

span.span: Renders the content in the frame with focus.

description.span: 将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。

span.span: Renders the content in the full window without frames.

para.span: 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 值。

span.span: Check your browser documentation to determine if the value is supported.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 目标值。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击控件时显示网页 r 的框架或窗口。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page r when the control is clicked. 通过设置属性来指定网页。The Web page is specified by setting the property. 当 属性 的值`HotSpotMode.PostBack`为时, 使用属性;当属性的值为时,将忽略此属性。`HotSpotMode.Navigate`The property is used when the value of the property is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`; it is ignored when the value of the property is `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. 如果未设置该属性, 则在单击该控件时, 将刷新带有焦点的浏览器或窗口。If the property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现`target`为属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. XHTML `target` 1.1 文档`anchor`类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果的 呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1, 请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 创建可访问的网页时, 强烈建议你避免使用属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended that you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
